entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.5°C

Visibility: 64.4 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of showers before morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning except a few flurries over higher terrain. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
